title: A Romantic Night in San Francisco
details: Begin with a romantic kiss at the airport around 6:45 PM before heading to dinner at Nopa at 8:30 PM. After dinner, enjoy cocktails and live music at Madrone Art Bar.

title: Golden Gate Park & Ghirardelli Square
details: Enjoy tea at the Japanese Tea Garden, take a romantic stroll in the Shakespeare Garden, and finish with sundaes at Ghirardelli Square.

title: Airport Lounge & Flight to Delhi
details: Champagne in the airport lounge before your adventure. Cozy up and enjoy a rom-com at 30,000 feet.

title: Delhi: Khan Market & Sunder Nursery
details: Shop at Khan Market and stroll through Sunder Nursery, where Mughal history meets blooming gardens.

title: India Gate & The Piano Man
details: Stroll past India Gate, then unwind at The Piano Man with live jazz and sweet cocktails.

title: Tattoos, Qutab Minar & Qla
details: Visit Devilz Tattoo for some ink and head to the iconic Qutab Minar before dining at Qla.

title: The Taj Mahal
details: Visit the Taj Mahal at sunrise for a breathtaking view of this symbol of eternal love.

title: Exploring Jaipur's Forts
details: Spend the day exploring Jaipur's grand forts, including the majestic Amber Fort and its famous Hall of Mirrors.

title: Rishikesh & Ashram Life
details: Arrive in Rishikesh and immerse yourself in meditation, yoga, and quiet walks along the Ganges River.

title: Goa: Sun, Sand & Passion
details: Relax by the sun-kissed beaches of Goa, sip cocktails at beachside bars, and enjoy the sunset.

title: Goa Flea Market & Evening Stroll
details: Shop for souvenirs, spices, and handmade jewelry at the Anjuna Flea Market before a romantic beach walk.
